scripts.makeS3Bucket: pipenv run awslocal s3 mb s3://bucket-of-lambdas
scripts.copyToS3Bucket: pipenv run awslocal s3 cp typescript-lambda.zip s3://bucket-of-lambdas
scripts.createLambda: pipenv run awslocal lambda create-function --function-name my-lambda --runtime nodejs12.x --code S3Bucket=bucket-of-lambdas,S3Key=typescript-lambda.zip --handler index.handler --role fake-role
scripts.updateLambda: pipenv run awslocal lambda update-function-code --function-name my-lambda --s3-bucket bucket-of-lambdas --s3-key typescript-lambda.zip
scripts.buildAndDeployLambda: npm run build && npm run makeS3Bucket && npm run copyToS3Bucket && npm run createLambda
scripts.buildAndUpdateLambda: npm run build && npm run copyToS3Bucket && npm run updateLambda
scripts.invokeLambda: pipenv run awslocal lambda invoke --function-name my-lambda response.json
